name: The Burial of our Dreams
description:
It's over... it's truly over.

Renalda's long bloody fight for her happiness has been finally won.

The people who destroyed her home and family are all dead, and the Vampire who hurt her and her loved ones lies staked at her feet.

But before it all ends, Renalda must reckon with her former lover... the Vampire she has just slain.

A tragic story about loss, and one dying Vampire. Made for 02A2 2022 Jam.

CW: Blood, death of a gay character.

Credits
  • Wannabe Cat (writer, programmer)
  • Temteno (Dahlia/Sprite artist)
  • Scroptels Gluzar (Environmental/Background Artist)
  • TangledVirus (itch) (Logo and UI Artist)
  • Yuuki Rafflesia (Musical Theme/Composer)

Word Count: 983
